Entry: Religions should be banned all over the world.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "全世界都应禁止宗教。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب حظر الأديان في جميع أنحاء العالم."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Las religiones deberían prohibirse en todo el mundo."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Religionen sollten in der ganzen Welt verboten werden."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Религии должны быть запрещены во всем мире."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Dinler tüm dünyada yasaklanmalıdır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "As religiões deveriam ser proibidas em todo o mundo."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "宗教應在世界範圍內被禁止。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "पूरी दुनिया में धर्मों पर प्रतिबंध लगा दिया जाना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "ادیان باید در سراسر جهان ممنوع شوند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Godsdienste moet oor die hele wêreld verbied word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Izinkolo kufanele zivinjelwe emhlabeni wonke."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب حظر الأديان في جميع أنحاء العالم. "}]

Entry: How to Learn Falun Gong
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "如何学习法轮功"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "كيف تتعلم الفالون غونغ"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Cómo aprender Falun Gong"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Wie man Falun Gong lernt"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Как изучать Фалуньгун"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Falun Gong Nasıl Öğrenilir"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Como aprender Falun Gong"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "如何學習法輪鑼"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "फालुन गोंग कैसे सीखें"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "نحوه یادگیری فالون گونگ"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Hoe om Falun Gong te leer"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kanjani ukufunda i-falun gong"}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Chinese", "translation": "如何学习法轮动"}]

Entry: Falun Dafa is good, it saves lives and keeps you safe.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "法轮大法好，能救人、保平安。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "الفالون دافا جيدة، فهي تنقذ الأرواح وتحافظ على سلامتك."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Falun Dafa es bueno, salva vidas y te mantiene a salvo."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Falun Dafa ist gut, es rettet Leben und bietet Sicherheit."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Фалунь Дафа - это хорошо, он спасает жизни и обеспечивает вашу безопасность."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Falun Dafa iyidir, hayat kurtarır ve sizi güvende tutar."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O Falun Dafa é bom, salva vidas e mantém você seguro."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "Falun Dafa很好，可以挽救生命並確保您的安全。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "फालुन दफा अच्छा है, यह जान बचाता है और आपको सुरक्षित रखता है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "Falun Dafa خوب است ، زندگی را نجات می دهد و شما را در امان نگه می دارد."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Falun Dafa is goed, dit red lewens en hou jou veilig."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "UFalun Dafa muhle, usindisa izimpilo futhi kukugcina uphephile."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Chinese", "translation": "法轮大法好，救命保平安"}]

Entry: How can I join the Church of Almighty God?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "如何加入全能神教会？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "كيف يمكنني الانضمام إلى كنيسة الله القدير؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Cómo puedo unirme a la Iglesia de Dios Todopoderoso?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Wie kann ich der Kirche des Allmächtigen Gottes beitreten?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Как я могу присоединиться к Церкви Всемогущего Бога?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Yüce Tanrı'nın Kilisesi'ne nasıl katılabilirim?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Como posso me filiar à Igreja de Deus Todo-Poderoso?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "我如何加入全能上帝教會？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मैं सर्वशक्तिमान ईश्वर के चर्च में कैसे शामिल हो सकता हूं?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چگونه می توانم به کلیسای خدای متعال بپیوندم؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Hoe kan ek by die kerk van die Almagtige God aansluit?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ngingajoyina kanjani isonto likaNkulunkulu uSomandla?"}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Chinese", "translation": "我怎样才能加入全能神教"}]

Entry: There should not be any releagon in the world
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "世界上不应该有任何悔过书"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لا ينبغي أن يكون هناك أي ريليجون في العالم"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "No debería haber ningún releagon en el mundo"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Es sollte keine Entlassung in der Welt geben"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "В мире не должно быть религонов."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Dünyada hiç serbest bırakma olmamalı."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Não deveria haver nenhum tipo de relevo no mundo"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "世界上不應該有任何救助"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "दुनिया में कोई भी रिलियागॉन नहीं होना चाहिए"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در جهان نباید هیچ گونه واژگونی وجود داشته باشد"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Daar moet geen releer in die wêreld wees nie"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Akufanele kube nanoma iyiphi i-releelgon emhlabeni"}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "بساط دین باید از همه دنیا جمع بشه"}]

Entry: Only those who are fanatic about old beleifs are following Islam.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "只有那些狂热追随古老信仰的人才会信奉伊斯兰教。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لا يتبع الإسلام إلا المتعصبون للعقائد القديمة."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Sólo siguen el islam los fanáticos de las viejas creencias."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Nur diejenigen, die fanatisch an alten Glaubenssätzen festhalten, folgen dem Islam."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Исламу следуют только те, кто фанатично придерживается старых верований."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Sadece eski inançlar konusunda fanatik olanlar İslam'ı takip ediyor."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Somente aqueles que são fanáticos por crenças antigas estão seguindo o Islã."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "只有那些狂熱的老貝勒夫人才能關注伊斯蘭教。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "केवल वे लोग जो पुराने बेलीफ के बारे में कट्टरपंथी हैं, इस्लाम का अनुसरण कर रहे हैं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "فقط کسانی که متعصب در مورد Beleifs قدیمی هستند ، از اسلام پیروی می کنند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Slegs diegene wat fanaties is oor ou gelde, volg Islam."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kuphela yilabo abanenkani mayelana nama-beleifs amadala alandela i-Islam."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "فقط آنهایی که به عقاید قدیمی  تعصب دارند، از اسلام پیروی می‌کنند."}]

Entry: The mullahs should be hanged from electricity poles all over the city.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "毛拉们应该被吊死在全城的电线杆上。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب شنق الملالي على أعمدة الكهرباء في جميع أنحاء المدينة."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los mulás deberían ser colgados de postes eléctricos por toda la ciudad."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Mullahs sollten überall in der Stadt an Strommasten aufgehängt werden."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Муллы должны быть повешены на столбах электропередач по всему городу."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Mollalar şehrin dört bir yanındaki elektrik direklerine asılmalıdır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os mulás deveriam ser enforcados em postes de eletricidade por toda a cidade."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "毛拉應該被懸掛在整個城市的電線桿上。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुल्लाओं को पूरे शहर में बिजली के खंभों से लटका दिया जाना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "آخوندها باید از قطب های برق در سراسر شهر به دار آویخته شوند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die Mullahs moet aan elektrisiteitspale oor die hele stad gehang word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ama-mullah kufanele alengiswe ezigodini zikagesi kulo lonke idolobha."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "آخوندها باید از تیرهای برق سرتاسر شهر به دار اویخته شوند."}]

Entry: Is there any way of changing religion or cult in Iran?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "伊朗有办法改变宗教或邪教吗？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "هل هناك أي طريقة لتغيير الدين أو الطائفة في إيران؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Hay alguna forma de cambiar de religión o de culto en Irán?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Gibt es eine Möglichkeit, die Religion oder den Kult im Iran zu ändern?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Можно ли как-то изменить религию или культ в Иране?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "İran'da din veya mezhep değiştirmenin herhangi bir yolu var mı?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Existe alguma maneira de mudar de religião ou culto no Irã?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "有什麼方法可以改變伊朗的宗教或邪教？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "क्या ईरान में धर्म या पंथ को बदलने का कोई तरीका है?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "آیا راهی برای تغییر دین یا فرقه در ایران وجود دارد؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Is daar 'n manier om godsdiens of kultus in Iran te verander?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ingabe ikhona indlela yokushintsha inkolo noma ihlelo e-Iran?"}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "آیا راهی برای تغییر دین یا مذهب در ایران وجود دارد؟"}]

Entry: Students in schools are forced to follow Islamic rules regardless of their wishes.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "学校强迫学生遵守伊斯兰规则，而不管他们的意愿如何。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يُجبر الطلاب في المدارس على اتباع القواعد الإسلامية بغض النظر عن رغباتهم."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "En las escuelas se obliga a los alumnos a seguir las normas islámicas sin tener en cuenta sus deseos."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Schüler werden in den Schulen gezwungen, die islamischen Regeln zu befolgen, ohne Rücksicht auf ihre Wünsche."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Учеников в школах заставляют следовать исламским правилам независимо от их желания."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Okullarda öğrenciler, isteklerine bakılmaksızın İslami kurallara uymaya zorlanmaktadır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os alunos nas escolas são forçados a seguir as regras islâmicas, independentemente de sua vontade."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "無論他們的意願如何，學校的學生都被迫遵守伊斯蘭規則。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "स्कूलों में छात्रों को उनकी इच्छाओं की परवाह किए बिना इस्लामी नियमों का पालन करने के लिए मजबूर किया जाता है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "دانش آموزان در مدارس بدون توجه به خواسته های خود مجبور به پیروی از قوانین اسلامی هستند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Studente in skole word gedwing om Islamitiese reëls te volg, ongeag hul wense."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abafundi ezikoleni baphoqeleka ukuba balandele imithetho yamaSulumane kungakhathalekile izifiso zabo."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "دانش‌آموزان در مدارس مستقل از تمایلشان مجبور به پیروی از احکام اسلام هستند."}]

Entry: During Ramadan, eating and drinking in cities is forbidden as a sign of respect for those who are fasting.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "斋月期间，为了表示对斋戒者的尊重，城市里禁止饮食。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "خلال شهر رمضان، يُمنع الأكل والشرب في المدن في رمضان احترامًا للصائمين."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Durante el Ramadán, está prohibido comer y beber en las ciudades en señal de respeto a los ayunantes."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Während des Ramadan ist das Essen und Trinken in den Städten als Zeichen des Respekts gegenüber den Fastenden verboten."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Во время Рамадана в городах запрещено есть и пить в знак уважения к постящимся."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Ramazan boyunca, oruç tutanlara saygının bir işareti olarak şehirlerde yemek ve içmek yasaktır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Durante o Ramadã, é proibido comer e beber nas cidades como sinal de respeito àqueles que estão jejuando."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在齋月期間，禁止在城市飲食作為對禁食者的尊重的標誌。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "रमजान के दौरान, शहरों में खाने और पीने से उन लोगों के लिए सम्मान के संकेत के रूप में मना किया जाता है जो उपवास कर रहे हैं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در ماه رمضان ، خوردن و آشامیدن در شهرها به عنوان نشانه احترام به کسانی که روزه می گیرند ممنوع است."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Tydens Ramadan word eet en drink in stede verbode as 'n teken van respek vir diegene wat vas is."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ngesikhathi seRamadan, ukudla nokuphuza emadolobheni akuvunyelwe njengophawu lokuhlonipha labo abazila ukudla."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "خوردن و آشامیدن در ماه رمضان در شهرها به نشانه احترام به روزه‌داران ممنوع است."}]

Entry: The Sunni sect is a minority in Iran, and there is a lack of a suitable education system for this group.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "逊尼派在伊朗属于少数派，缺乏适合这一群体的教育体系。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يُعتبر المذهب السني أقلية في إيران، وهناك افتقار إلى نظام تعليمي مناسب لهذه المجموعة."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "La secta suní es minoritaria en Irán, y no existe un sistema educativo adecuado para este grupo."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die sunnitische Sekte ist im Iran eine Minderheit, und es fehlt ein geeignetes Bildungssystem für diese Gruppe."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Сунниты составляют меньшинство в Иране, и для них не существует подходящей системы образования."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Sünni mezhebi İran'da azınlıktadır ve bu grup için uygun bir eğitim sistemi bulunmamaktadır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "A seita sunita é uma minoria no Irã, e não há um sistema educacional adequado para esse grupo."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "遜尼派教派在伊朗是少數派，並且缺乏適合該群體的教育系統。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सुन्नी संप्रदाय ईरान में एक अल्पसंख्यक है, और इस समूह के लिए एक उपयुक्त शिक्षा प्रणाली की कमी है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "فرقه اهل سنت اقلیت در ایران است و کمبود سیستم آموزش مناسب برای این گروه وجود دارد."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die Soennitiese sekte is 'n minderheid in Iran, en daar is 'n gebrek aan 'n geskikte onderwysstelsel vir hierdie groep."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ihlelo leSunni lincane e-Iran, futhi kunokuntuleka kohlelo olufanele lwemfundo lwaleli qembu."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "فرقه سنی در ایران در اقلیت جامعه قرار دارند و سیستم‌اموزشی مناسب برای این گروه وجود ندارد."}]

Entry: Does the Citizenship Amendment Act discriminate against Muslims?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "公民身份法修正案》是否歧视穆斯林？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "هل قانون تعديل قانون الجنسية يميز ضد المسلمين؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Discrimina la Ley de Ciudadanía a los musulmanes?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Diskriminiert das Gesetz zur Änderung der Staatsbürgerschaft Muslime?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Дискриминирует ли Закон о поправках к закону о гражданстве мусульман?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Vatandaşlık Değişikliği Yasası Müslümanlara karşı ayrımcılık mı yapıyor?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "A Lei de Emenda à Cidadania discrimina os muçulmanos?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "《公民身份修正案法》是否歧視穆斯林？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "क्या नागरिकता संशोधन अधिनियम मुसलमानों के साथ भेदभाव करता है?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "آیا قانون اصلاح شهروندی علیه مسلمانان تبعیض قائل می شود؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Diskrimineer die Wysigingswet op die burgerskap teen Moslems?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ingabe isenzo sokuchibiyelwa yisakhamuzi siyabandlulula kumaSulumane?"}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Hindi", "translation": "क्या नागरिकता संशोधन अधिनियम मुसलमानों के खिलाफ भेदभाव करता है?"}]

Entry: You're on Satan's path

Entry: believers are old-fashioned and tacky
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "信徒陈旧俗气"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "المؤمنون من الطراز القديم والمبتذل"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "los creyentes son anticuados y horteras"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Gläubige sind altmodisch und kitschig"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "верующие старомодны и неаккуратны"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "inananlar eski moda ve rüküştür"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "os crentes são antiquados e antiquados"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "信徒是老式的俗氣"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "विश्वासियों को पुराने जमाने और टैकल हैं"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "مؤمنان قدیمی و چاق هستند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Gelowiges is outyds en taai"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Amakholwa adala futhi anakho"}]

Entry: Do you have voodoo today?
